verses.verse: And it came to pass in the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, in the twelfth month <S%H2320><s%>, in the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, that the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, take up <S%H5375><s%> a lamentation <S%H7015><s%> over Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H1819><s%>, Thou wast likened unto a young lion <S%H3715><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>: yet art thou as a monster <S%H8577><s%> in the seas <S%H3220><s%>; and thou didst break forth <S%H1518><s%> with thy rivers <S%H5104><s%>, and troubledst <S%H1804><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> with thy feet <S%H7272><s%>, and fouledst <S%H7515><s%> their rivers <S%H5104><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: I will spread out <S%H6566><s%> my net <S%H7568><s%> upon thee with a company <S%H6951><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%>; and they shall bring thee up <S%H5927><s%> in my net <S%H2764><s%>.

And I will leave <S%H5203><s%> thee upon the land <S%H776><s%>, I will cast thee forth <S%H2904><s%> upon the open <S%H6440><s%> field <S%H7704><s%>, and will cause all the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%> to settle <S%H7931><s%> upon thee <S%H7646><s%>, and I will satisfy the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the whole earth with thee <S%H776><s%>.
And I will lay <S%H5414><s%> thy flesh <S%H1320><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and fill <S%H4390><s%> the valleys <S%H1516><s%> with thy height <S%H7419><s%>.

I will also water <S%H8248><s%> with thy blood <S%H1818><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> wherein thou swimmest <S%H6824><s%>, even to the mountains <S%H2022><s%>; and the watercourses <S%H650><s%> shall be full of thee <S%H4390><s%>.

And when I shall extinguish <S%H3518><s%> thee <S%H3680><s%>, I will cover the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and make <S%H6937><s%> the stars <S%H3556><s%> thereof dark <S%H6937><s%>; I will cover <S%H3680><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> with a cloud <S%H6051><s%>, and the moon <S%H3394><s%> shall not give <S%H215><s%> its light <S%H216><s%>.

All the bright <S%H3974><s%> lights <S%H216><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> will I make dark <S%H6937><s%> over thee <S%H5414><s%>, and set darkness <S%H2822><s%> upon thy land <S%H776><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

I will also vex <S%H3707><s%> the hearts <S%H3820><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%>, when I shall bring <S%H935><s%> thy destruction <S%H7667><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, into the countries <S%H776><s%> which thou hast not known <S%H3045><s%>.

Yea <S%H7227><s%>, I will make many peoples <S%H5971><s%> amazed <S%H8074><s%> at thee <S%H4428><s%>, and their kings shall be horribly <S%H8178><s%> afraid <S%H8175><s%> for thee <S%H5774><s%>, when I shall brandish my sword <S%H2719><s%> before them <S%H6440><s%>; and they shall tremble <S%H2729><s%> at every moment <S%H7281><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> for his own life <S%H5315><s%>, in the day <S%H3117><s%> of thy fall <S%H4658><s%>.
For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: The sword <S%H2719><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> shall come upon thee <S%H935><s%>.

By the swords <S%H2719><s%> of the mighty <S%H1368><s%> will I cause thy multitude <S%H1995><s%> to fall <S%H5307><s%>; the terrible <S%H6184><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> are they all <S%H7703><s%>: and they shall bring to nought the pride <S%H1347><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and all the multitude <S%H1995><s%> thereof shall be destroyed <S%H8045><s%>.

I will destroy <S%H6><s%> also all the beasts <S%H929><s%> thereof from <S%H5921><s%> beside many <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>; neither shall the foot <S%H7272><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> trouble <S%H1804><s%> them any more <S%H6541><s%>, nor the hoofs of beasts <S%H929><s%> trouble them <S%H1804><s%>.

Then will I make their waters <S%H4325><s%> clear <S%H8257><s%>, and cause their rivers <S%H5104><s%> to run <S%H3212><s%> like oil <S%H8081><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

When I shall make <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%> and waste <S%H776><s%>, a land destitute <S%H8074><s%> of that whereof it was full <S%H4393><s%>, when I shall smite <S%H5221><s%> all them that dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein <S%H3045><s%>, then shall they know that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

This is the lamentation <S%H7015><s%> wherewith they shall lament <S%H6969><s%>; the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall lament <S%H6969><s%> therewith <S%H4714><s%>; over Egypt, and over all her multitude <S%H1995><s%>, shall they lament <S%H6969><s%> therewith <S%H5002><s%>, saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

It came to pass also in the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, in the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, that the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, wail <S%H5091><s%> for the multitude <S%H1995><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and cast them down <S%H3381><s%>, even her <S%H1323><s%>, and the daughters of the famous <S%H117><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%>, unto the nether parts <S%H8482><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, with them that go down <S%H3381><s%> into the pit <S%H953><s%>.
Whom dost thou pass in beauty <S%H5276><s%>? go down <S%H3381><s%>, and be thou laid <S%H7901><s%> with the uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%>.

They shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them that are slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>: she is delivered <S%H5414><s%> to the sword <S%H2719><s%>; draw <S%H4900><s%> her away and all her multitudes <S%H1995><s%>.

The strong <S%H410><s%> among the mighty <S%H1368><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to him out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Sheol <S%H7585><s%> with them that help <S%H5826><s%> him <S%H3381><s%>: they are gone down, they lie <S%H7901><s%> still <S%H6189><s%>, even the uncircumcised, slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

Asshur <S%H804><s%> is there and all her company <S%H6951><s%>; her graves <S%H6913><s%> are round about <S%H5439><s%> her <S%H2491><s%>; all of them slain, fallen <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>;

whose graves <S%H6913><s%> are set <S%H5414><s%> in the uttermost <S%H3411><s%> parts of the pit <S%H953><s%>, and her company <S%H6951><s%> is round about <S%H5439><s%> her grave <S%H6900><s%>; all of them slain <S%H2491><s%>, fallen <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, who caused <S%H5414><s%> terror <S%H2851><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>.

There is Elam <S%H5867><s%> and all her multitude <S%H1995><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> her grave <S%H6900><s%>; all of them slain <S%H2491><s%>, fallen <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, who are gone down <S%H3381><s%> uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> into the nether parts <S%H8482><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, who caused <S%H5414><s%> their terror <S%H2851><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>, and have borne <S%H5375><s%> their shame <S%H3639><s%> with them that go down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit <S%H953><s%>.

They have set <S%H5414><s%> her a bed <S%H4904><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the slain <S%H2491><s%> with all her multitude <S%H1995><s%>; her graves <S%H6913><s%> are round about <S%H5439><s%> her <S%H6189><s%>; all of them uncircumcised, slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>; for their terror <S%H2851><s%> was caused <S%H5414><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>, and they have borne <S%H5375><s%> their shame <S%H3639><s%> with them that go down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit <S%H953><s%>: he is put <S%H5414><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them that are slain <S%H2491><s%>.

There is Meshech <S%H4902><s%>, Tubal <S%H8422><s%>, and all their multitude <S%H1995><s%>; their graves <S%H6913><s%> are round about <S%H5439><s%> them <S%H6189><s%>; all of them uncircumcised, slain <S%H2490><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>; for they caused <S%H5414><s%> their terror <S%H2851><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>.

And they shall not lie <S%H7901><s%> with the mighty <S%H1368><s%> that are fallen <S%H5307><s%> of the uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%>, that are gone down <S%H3381><s%> to Sheol <S%H7585><s%> with their weapons <S%H3627><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>, and have laid <S%H5414><s%> their swords <S%H2719><s%> under their heads <S%H7218><s%>, and their iniquities <S%H5771><s%> are upon their bones <S%H6106><s%>; for they were the terror <S%H2851><s%> of the mighty <S%H1368><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>.
But thou shalt be broken <S%H7665><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%>, and shalt lie <S%H7901><s%> with them that are slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

There is Edom <S%H123><s%>, her kings <S%H4428><s%> and all her princes <S%H5387><s%>, who in their might <S%H1369><s%> are laid <S%H5414><s%> with them that are slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>: they shall lie <S%H7901><s%> with the uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%>, and with them that go down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit <S%H953><s%>.

There are the princes <S%H5257><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%>, all of them <S%H6722><s%>, and all the Sidonians, who are gone down <S%H3381><s%> with the slain <S%H2491><s%>; in the terror <S%H2851><s%> which they caused by their might <S%H1369><s%> they are put to shame <S%H954><s%>; and they lie <S%H7901><s%> uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> with them that are slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and bear <S%H5375><s%> their shame <S%H3639><s%> with them that go down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit <S%H953><s%>.

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> them <S%H5162><s%>, and shall be comforted over all his multitude <S%H1995><s%>, even Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and all his army <S%H2428><s%>, slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

For I have put <S%H5414><s%> his terror <S%H2851><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>; and he shall be laid <S%H7901><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%>, with them that are slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, even Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and all his multitude <S%H1995><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.
